item.description:
www.Buywithme.com has a coupon for white water rafting for $37. The original price is $74. If you are interested in going for a trip, please buy your coupon and post a comment and we can schedule a trip shortly.

 

The coupon has 2 options. Kennebec river and Penobscot river. I prefer the second one as it is even more intense. We might have to travel a day before and stay overnight as the drive is long for same day commute. The rafting starts at around 8:30 AM and it takes 5 hours to drive there.

 

We will be leaving on 18th around 11:00 AM and reach there by 4:00 PM. Please let us know if you can drive others and they can share the cost of gas and toll.
item.name: White water rafting
